Package hospital

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
hospital.Menu
public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the menu in the Hospital Booking System.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private User activeUser
    The staff member who currently using the system.
    private Staff staff
    The collection of employees in the hospital (doctors, nurses, etc.)
    private UndoRedoHandler undoRedoHandler
    The handler which responsible for the undo/redo function of the system.

  • Field Details

    • staff

      private Staff staff
      The collection of employees in the hospital (doctors, nurses, etc.)

    • activeUser

      private User activeUser
      The staff member who currently using the system. Null if nobody is logged in.

    • undoRedoHandler

      private final UndoRedoHandler undoRedoHandler
      The handler which responsible for the undo/redo function of the system. Every action which needs to be undoable have to be registered by this handler.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu()
      Constructor of the Menu class.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Entry point of the application
      Parameters:
      args - input arguments

    • showMenu

      private void showMenu()
      Displays the menu options

    • showAdminMenu

      private void showAdminMenu()
      Displays the menu for the administrator

    • processAdminChoice

      public void processAdminChoice()
      Processes administrator choices.

    • processUserChoice

      public void processUserChoice()
      Method to process users choice from the menu and activate corresponding function. Please note that it uses a Genio class written by UoD to handle data input.

    • displayAppointments

      private void displayAppointments​(java.util.List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays a list of appointments in a table.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to display

    • generateTableRow

      private java.lang.String generateTableRow​(java.lang.String cell1, java.lang.String cell2, java.lang.String cell3, java.lang.String cell4, java.lang.String cell5, java.lang.String cell6)
      method to generate table row
      Parameters:
      cell1 - first row cell
      cell2 - second row cell
      cell3 - third row cell
      cell4 - fourth row cell
      cell5 - fifth row cell
      cell6 - sixth row cell
      Returns:
      the formatted table row

    • displayTableRowDivider

      private void displayTableRowDivider()
      method to display the table row divider

    • searchAppointment

      private void searchAppointment()
      This method displays an appointment's information with the given appointment and professional's IDs

    • addAppointment

      private void addAppointment()
      Get inputs from the user for a new appointment, verify it and adds it to the database.

    • editAppointment

      private void editAppointment()
      Get inputs from a user for editing an existing appointment and modify it after verification.

    • deleteAppointment

      private void deleteAppointment()
      Gets and ID from the user to delete one of their appointment. After verification, deletes it.

    • backupStaff

      private void backupStaff()
      Safe staff and all of its data to be able to restore later

    • restoreStaff

      private void restoreStaff()
      Restore the staff and all of its data.

    • changePassword

      private void changePassword()
      Allows the active user to change the password.

    • startMenu

      private java.lang.String startMenu()
      Start menu that is shown upon starting the program. Allows to user to either login or to exit the system.
      Returns:
      received input of the user: 1 for login, 0 to exit the system

    • logOut

      private void logOut()
      Logs the user out of the system.

    • logIn

      private java.lang.String logIn()
      Prompts the user to log-in
      Returns:
      "admin" or "professional" depending on who logged in to the system, or "noUser" if logging in was unsuccessful.

    • changeDetails

      private void changeDetails()
      Updates the user details. User is able to change their first and last names and the office.

    • addTask

      private void addTask()
      Adds a task to the active user's task list.

    • removeTask

      private void removeTask()
      Removes a task from the active user's diary.

    • displayTaskList

      private void displayTaskList()
      Displays the task list of the active user.

    • addStaffMember

      private void addStaffMember()
      Adds a new staff member to the crew. Part of administrator management.

    • removeStaffMember

      private void removeStaffMember()
      Removes a staff member from the crew. Part of administrator management.

    • addTreatmentType

      private void addTreatmentType()
      Adds a new treatment type to the hospital. Part of administrator management.

    • editWorkingHours

      public void editWorkingHours()
      Edits the working hours of the Professional

    • showManual

      public void showManual()
      method to open the manual PDF
